name: Copydog
description:
Copydog was created as part of GMTK Jam 2022.

It is a turn-based RPG where you play as a Dog, who is also a Knight. You have magic dice that can mimic the attacks they receive.

You'll need to be strategic with which abilities you copy because some are more effective than others.

Credits

Player and enemy assets by Dungeon Mason

Environment assets by Polyperfect

Skybox assets by Render Knight

All Icons from https://game-icons.net

Song "Mystery Sax" by Kevin MacLeod
